tags.name: lrnsys-dialog
tags.description:
`lrnsys-dialog`

Events:

  * `simple-modal-show` {`CustomEvent<{ title: any; elements: { header: HTMLSpanElement; content: HTMLSpanElement; }; styles: { "--simple-modal-width": string; "--simple-modal-max-width": string; "--simple-modal-min-height": string; }; invokedBy: any; clone: boolean; }>`} - 

  * `focus-changed` {`CustomEvent<{ focus: boolean; }>`} - 

Attributes:

  * `raised` {`boolean`} - If the button should be visually lifted off the UI.

  * `alt` {`string`} - Alt / hover text for this link

  * `header` {`string`} - Header for the dialog

  * `hover-class` {`string`} - Classes to add / subtract based on the item being hovered

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} - Disabled state.

  * `focus-state` {`boolean`} - Tracks if focus state is applied

  * `avatar` {`string`} - Icon to present for clicking.

  * `icon` {`string`} - Icon to present for clicking.

  * `text` {`string`} - Text to present for clicking.

  * `heading-class` {`string`} - Default heading classes.

  * `accent-color` {`string`} - a selected accent-"color": grey, red, pink, purple, etc.

  * `dark` {`boolean`} - make the default theme dark?

Properties:

  * `raised` {`boolean`} - If the button should be visually lifted off the UI.

  * `alt` {`string`} - Alt / hover text for this link

  * `header` {`string`} - Header for the dialog

  * `hoverClass` {`string`} - Classes to add / subtract based on the item being hovered

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} - Disabled state.

  * `focusState` {`boolean`} - Tracks if focus state is applied

  * `avatar` {`string`} - Icon to present for clicking.

  * `icon` {`string`} - Icon to present for clicking.

  * `text` {`string`} - Text to present for clicking.

  * `headingClass` {`string`} - Default heading classes.

  * `__modal` - 

  * `accentColor` {`string`} - a selected accent-"color": grey, red, pink, purple, etc.

  * `dark` {`boolean`} - make the default theme dark?

  * `colors` -

tags.name: lrnsys-drawer
tags.description:
`lrnsys-drawer`

Events:

  * `simple-drawer-show` {`CustomEvent<{ title: any; elements: { content: HTMLSpanElement; header: HTMLSpanElement; }; invokedBy: any; align: string; size: string; clone: boolean; }>`} - 

  * `focus-changed` {`CustomEvent<{ focus: boolean; }>`} - 

Attributes:

  * `raised` {`boolean`} - If the button should be visually lifted off the UI.

  * `alt` {`string`} - Alt / hover text for this link

  * `header` {`string`} - Header for the drawer

  * `hover-class` {`string`} - Classes to add / subtract based on the item being hovered

  * `opened` {`boolean`} - State for if it is currently open.

  * `align` {`string`} - Side of the screen to align the flyout (right or left)

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} - Disabled state.

  * `focus-state` {`boolean`} - Tracks if focus state is applied

  * `avatar` {`string`} - Icon to present for clicking.

  * `icon` {`string`} - Icon to present for clicking.

  * `text` {`string`} - Text to present for clicking.

  * `accent-color` {`string`} - a selected accent-"color": grey, red, pink, purple, etc.

  * `dark` {`boolean`} - make the default theme dark?

Properties:

  * `raised` {`boolean`} - If the button should be visually lifted off the UI.

  * `alt` {`string`} - Alt / hover text for this link

  * `header` {`string`} - Header for the drawer

  * `hoverClass` {`string`} - Classes to add / subtract based on the item being hovered

  * `opened` {`boolean`} - State for if it is currently open.

  * `align` {`string`} - Side of the screen to align the flyout (right or left)

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} - Disabled state.

  * `focusState` {`boolean`} - Tracks if focus state is applied

  * `avatar` {`string`} - Icon to present for clicking.

  * `icon` {`string`} - Icon to present for clicking.

  * `text` {`string`} - Text to present for clicking.

  * `__modal` - 

  * `accentColor` {`string`} - a selected accent-"color": grey, red, pink, purple, etc.

  * `dark` {`boolean`} - make the default theme dark?

  * `colors` -
